title: fizz leaves mid I mia...
body: fizz repeatedly ganks bot/top over the next 10 minutes (never returning to lane) and I get flamed for no mia's. k

replies.body: He's getting hit with the nerf bat currently on the pbe so just hold on for a little while then you will never see him again because like LB he'll take skill to play and tonnes of people will drop him.

if their mid gets fed and roams for free kills you are to blame mostly, in this situation where you have f-ed up all you can do is get a pink + green and ward his roaming routes whenever possible... also ping when you have vision of him going bot/top..
